item.title: Federal judge to sentence Justice Brett Kavanaugh's attempted assassin
item.description: A defendant faces sentencing Friday for attempting to assassinate Supreme Court Justice Brett Kavanaugh, with prosecutors seeking 30 years in prison.

item.title: Giuliani allies turn on GOP’s Sliwa, back Cuomo in NYC mayor race
item.description: Giuliani allies support Andrew Cuomo's independent mayoral bid to prevent socialist Zohran Mamdani from winning New York City's three-way race.

item.title: ICE director says Portland facility faces violence with 'little help from local police'

item.title: David Hogg’s PAC spent millions on consultants, ads and fitness classes, records show: report

item.title: Hawley blasts FDA approval of new abortion drug, cites safety and trust concerns
